meanings.sent1: The scientist conducted a hydrolytic experiment in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The hydrolytic process breaks down molecules into smaller parts.
meanings.sent3: The hydrolytic reaction was so powerful, it turned the solution blue!
meanings.sent4: Her hydrolytic skills in chemistry class were like magic, transforming compounds effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The hydrolytic nature of the enzyme made it a crucial component in the reaction.

meanings.sent1: The hydrolytic reaction was essential for the experiment's success.
meanings.sent2: The hydrolytic breakdown of the substance released valuable nutrients.
meanings.sent3: The hydrolytic effect on the material was unexpected but fascinating.
meanings.sent4: The hydrolytic power of the acid was unmatched, dissolving everything in its path.
meanings.sent5: The hydrolytic properties of the compound made it ideal for the chemical reaction.
